Curtis Miller Ruby Developer | Founder

Curtis is a ruby developer who holds a MS in Computer Science, with an emphasis on Software Engineering. This intense study of the process by which software is created led him to the Agile Methodology, which is the basis of Flatterline's approach to software development.

He has been developing software for over 10 years and has worked on large, distributed systems for the US Navy, behavioral health EHR systems and large-scale CMS, as well as dozens of small startup ideas.

He found his true passion developing web applications using the Ruby programming language and hasnâ€™t looked back since.
